unnormalised: Inflation hits the local sabzi mandi! Remember when you could get a whole kilo of tomatoes for Rs. 20? Those were the days, my friend. Now, even bhindi is asking for a hefty Rs 80/kg. Guess I'll be eating roti and air this week.
normalised: inflation hits the local sabzi mandi! remember when you could get a whole kilogram of tomatoes for rupee twenty? those were the days, my friend. now, even bhindi is asking for a hefty rupee eighty per kilogram. guess I'll be eating roti and air this week.

unnormalised: The vegetable vendors are blaming the monsoon, but I suspect it's a conspiracy by the onion mafia. Either way, my wallet is weeping. Anyone know a good loan shark? Asking for a friend, of course. Maybe I should start a "Bring Back Cheap Vegetables" campaign!
normalised: the vegetable vendors are blaming the monsoon, but i suspect it's a conspiracy by the onion mafia. either way, my wallet is weeping. anyone know a good loan shark? asking for a friend, of course. maybe i should start a "bring back cheap vegetables" campaign!

unnormalised: On a slightly related note, Gold touched Rs 72,000 per 10 grams today. Guess I'll just stick to my silver jewelry, which probably appreciated by Rs. 2, at best. Sigh. Guess the only investment I can afford is more chai. At Rs. 10 a cup, that's still a bargain!
normalised: on a slightly related note, gold touched rupee seventy two thousand per ten grams today. guess i'll just stick to my silver jewelry, which probably appreciated by rupee two, at best. sigh. guess the only investment i can afford is more chai. at rupee ten a cup, that's still a bargain!
